alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Decatur; Grady; Seminole; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Jackson, northern Gadsden, northern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, Madison, southern Decatur, southern Grady, southern Thomas, southern Brooks and southern Seminole Counties through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 536 PM EDT/436 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Chattahoochee to near Blue Springs. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Madison, Quincy, Havana, Bainbridge, Thomasville, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Greenville, Attapulgus, Lee, Climax, Alma, Douglas City, Florence, Everett, Jamieson, Pinetta and Rocky Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
